bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and Method for Rapid Updating of Credit Information

abstract.p: According to one embodiment, the invention relates to a system and method for evaluating the creditworthiness of an account holder of a credit account comprising the steps of determining, at least once a day, whether a first data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder has been received from a credit reporting organization
determining, at least once a day, whether a second data set relating to transaction activity of the credit account has been received
periodically receiving from a credit reporting organization a third data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder
periodically receiving a fourth data set relating to the historical activity of the credit account
and using the first and second data sets, to the extent they have been received, and the third and fourth data sets to determine a measure of creditworthiness

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for rapid updating of credit information

determining, at least once a day, whether a second data set relating to transaction activity of the credit account has been received
periodically receiving from a credit reporting organization a third data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder
periodically receiving a fourth data set relating to the historical activity of the credit account
and using the first and second data sets, to the extent they have been received, and the third and fourth data sets to determine a measure of creditworthiness.

abstract.p: According to one embodiment, the invention relates to a system and method for evaluating the creditworthiness of an account holder of a credit account comprising the steps of determining, at least once a day, whether a first data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder has been received from a credit reporting organization
determining, at least once a day, whether a second data set relating to transaction activity of the credit account has been received
periodically receiving from a credit reporting organization a third data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder
periodically receiving a fourth data set relating to the historical activity of the credit account
and using the first and second data sets, to the extent they have been received, and the third and fourth data sets to determine a measure of creditworthiness.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and Apparatus Pertaining to Metrics-Based Prioritization of Billing Exceptions

abstract.p: A computer-based billing system presents, via an end-user interface, a plurality of exceptions as have occurred with respect to corresponding billing events as pertain to a plurality of billed parties while also presenting exceptions metrics as pertain to this plurality of exceptions. These exceptions metrics include at least one age-related metric, at least one financial-related metric, and at least one count-related metric. These teachings then further provide for permitting the end user to selectively prioritize the presenting of the plurality of exceptions as a function of at least one of these exceptions metrics.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and Apparatus Pertaining to Metrics-Based Prioritization of Billing Exceptions

abstract.p: A computer-based billing system presents, via an end-user interface, a plurality of exceptions as have occurred with respect to corresponding billing events as pertain to a plurality of billed parties while also presenting exceptions metrics as pertain to this plurality of exceptions. These exceptions metrics include at least one age-related metric, at least one financial-related metric, and at least one count-related metric. These teachings then further provide for permitting the end user to selectively prioritize the presenting of the plurality of exceptions as a function of at least one of these exceptions metrics.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS PERTAINING TO METRICS-BASED PRIORITIZATION OF BILLING EXCEPTIONS

abstract.p: Insurance billing includes receiving a plurality of exceptions arising out of one or more billing events and associated with one or more billed parties
categorizing the plurality of exceptions into a plurality of exception groups based at least in part on one or more types of exceptions
determining, for an exception group corresponding to a particular type of exception, a plurality of exception metrics for each of one or more corresponding billed parties
presenting, to the user, a selectable plurality of exception groups

and in response to a user selection of a particular exception group, presenting to the user one or more billed party identifiers of the one or more corresponding billed parties in the particular exception group and the plurality of exception metrics determined for each of the one or more corresponding billed parties.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS PERTAINING TO METRICS-BASED PRIORITIZATION OF BILLING EXCEPTIONS

abstract.p: Insurance billing includes receiving a plurality of exceptions arising out of one or more billing events and associated with one or more billed parties
categorizing the plurality of exceptions into a plurality of exception groups based at least in part on one or more types of exceptions
determining, for an exception group corresponding to a particular type of exception, a plurality of exception metrics for each of one or more corresponding billed parties
presenting, to the user, a selectable plurality of exception groups

and in response to a user selection of a particular exception group, presenting to the user one or more billed party identifiers of the one or more corresponding billed parties in the particular exception group and the plurality of exception metrics determined for each of the one or more corresponding billed parties.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RAPID UPDATING OF CREDIT INFORMATION
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE POUR METTRE A JOUR RAPIDEMENT DES INFORMATIONS DE SOLVABILITE

abstract.p: According to one embodiment, the invention relates to a system and method for evaluating the creditworthiness of an account holder of a credit account comprising the steps of determining, at least once a day, whether a first data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder has been received from a credit reporting organization
determining, at least once a day, whether a second data set relating to transaction activity of the credit account has been received
periodically receiving from a credit reporting organization a third data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder
periodically receiving a fourth data set relating to the historical activity of the credit account
and using the first and second data sets, to the extent they have been received, and the third and fourth data sets to determine a measure of creditworthiness.

Un mode de réalisation de l'invention concerne un système et un procédé pour évaluer la solvabilité d'un titulaire d'un compte de crédit. Ledit procédé comprend les étapes consistant à déterminer, au moins une fois par jour, si un premier ensemble de données relatives à la solvabilité du titulaire du compte, envoyé par une organisation communiquant des informations de solvabilité, a été reçu
déterminer, au moins une fois par jour, si un deuxième ensemble de données relatives aux transactions effectuées sur le compte de crédit a été reçu
recevoir périodiquement de la part d'une organisation communiquant des informations de solvabilité, un troisième ensemble de données relatives à la solvabilité du titulaire du compte
recevoir périodiquement un quatrième ensemble de données relatives à l'historique du compte de crédit
et utiliser le premier et le deuxième ensemble de données, dans la mesure où ils ont été reçus, ainsi que le troisième et le quatrième ensemble de données pour mesurer la solvabilité.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR RAPID UPDATING OF CREDIT INFORMATION
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE POUR METTRE A JOUR RAPIDEMENT DES INFORMATIONS DE SOLVABILITE

abstract.p: A system and method for evaluating the creditworthiness of an account holder of a credit account by determining at least once a day whether a first data set relating to the creditworthiness has been received from a credit reporting organization (104), determining whether a second data set relating to transaction activity of the credit account has been received (124), receiving from a credit reporting organization a third data set relating to the creditworthiness of the account holder (104), receiving a fourth data set relating to the historical activity of the credit account (122), and using all data set to determine a measure of creditworthness.

Un mode de réalisation de l'invention concerne un système et un procédé pour évaluer la solvabilité d'un titulaire d'un compte de crédit. Ledit procédé comprend les étapes consistant à déterminer, au moins une fois par jour, si un premier ensemble de données relatives à la solvabilité du titulaire du compte, envoyé par une organisation communiquant des informations de solvabilité, a été reçu
déterminer, au moins une fois par jour, si un deuxième ensemble de données relatives aux transactions effectuées sur le compte de crédit a été reçu
recevoir périodiquement de la part d'une organisation communiquant des informations de solvabilité, un troisième ensemble de données relatives à la solvabilité du titulaire du compte
recevoir périodiquement un quatrième ensemble de données relatives à l'historique du compte de crédit
et utiliser le premier et le deuxième ensemble de données, dans la mesure où ils ont été reçus, ainsi que le troisième et le quatrième ensemble de données pour mesurer la solvabilité.
